mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_code empCode, e.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, e.rank_code rankCode, e.emp_profile profile, e.emp_id empId, e.emp_kor_name korName, e.emp_reg_no regNo, e.emp_phone phone FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON e.team_code = t.team_code WHERE e.emp_code = #{empCode}

SELECT n.notice_num noticeNum, n.notice_writer noticeEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name noticeWriter, f.original_file_name noticeFileName, n.notice_title noticeTitle, n.notice_content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_create_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_update_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate, n.notice_count noticeCount FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON n.notice_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON n.file_name = f.file_name ORDER BY n.notice_num DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, 5

SELECT m.msg_num msgNum, m.msg_sender sender, CASE WHEN se.rank_code = 1 THEN CONCAT(se.emp_kor_name, ' 대표') WHEN se.rank_code = 2 THEN CONCAT(se.emp_kor_name, ' 부장') WHEN se.rank_code = 3 THEN CONCAT(se.emp_kor_name, ' 팀장') WHEN se.rank_code = 4 THEN CONCAT(se.emp_kor_name, ' 대리') WHEN se.rank_code = 5 THEN CONCAT(se.emp_kor_name, ' 사원') ELSE se.emp_kor_name END senderName, m.msg_receiver receiver, CASE WHEN re.rank_code = 1 THEN CONCAT(re.emp_kor_name, ' 대표') WHEN re.rank_code = 2 THEN CONCAT(re.emp_kor_name, ' 부장') WHEN re.rank_code = 3 THEN CONCAT(re.emp_kor_name, ' 팀장') WHEN re.rank_code = 4 THEN CONCAT(re.emp_kor_name, ' 대리') WHEN re.rank_code = 5 THEN CONCAT(re.emp_kor_name, ' 사원') ELSE re.emp_kor_name END receiverName, m.msg_title msgTitle, m.msg_content msgContent, DATE_FORMAT(m.msg_send_time, '%y년 %m월 %d일 %H시') AS sendTime FROM msg m JOIN emp re ON m.msg_receiver = re.emp_code JOIN emp se ON m.msg_sender = se.emp_code WHERE m.msg_receiver = #{empCode} AND m.msg_receive_del_status = 'N' ORDER BY m.msg_send_time DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, 5
